Better Partials Plugin for Ruby on Rails

Looks promising. I’d call it syntactic sugar for rendering partials, but it’s more like a well-thought-out refactoring of a method that has seen a lot of growth and changes. I’ve already got it checked out in a branch on one of my current projects and will give it a go next time I’m doing view refactoring.
